title: Waste Classification using CNN
description: A deep learning project for classifying images of waste into metal, glass, plastic, paper, or trash using TensorFlow and OpenCV.

title: Body Fat Predictor
description: A machine learning model built using the Random Forest algorithm to predict body fat percentage from health metrics.

title: Linear Equation Solver
description: A C++ console program that solves systems of linear equations using the Gaussian Elimination method.
